name: Quaking
description:
This year's topic - Out of Control - made me think more about how it can be hard to control thoughts and emotions. That sometimes we always focus on the things that we can't control rather than what we CAN control. 

This game revolves around a duck who doesn't feel good enough to stand with her classmates. 

This is my first time entering for Game Jam so I hope you enjoy it * _ *

Art + Story all by me~

Music by Kevin MacLeod
